website_summaries.verdict: The carrier's location keeps your center of gravity low and lets you communicate with your child, too.
pros: Made for children ages 1 through 4 and weighing less than 38 pounds
Center mounted for better center of gravity and mobility for the adult rider
Better view for child than rear mount
Does not significantly affect riding position
cons: May need to raise your steering column slightly to accommodate seat
If you have a short stem, it may not fit

customer_reviews.title: Not safe! Metal bar that hooks to bike cracked in half!!
customer_reviews.text: We ordered this bike seat in December, and since the weather is starting to warm up, we finally opened it to install. The metal piece that hooks around the bike was completely snapped in half. This was a complete waste of money. I never thought to see that the pieces weren't damaged. It was brand new, and unfortunately, now, I'm past the return window. On a positive note, my daughter is safe. This could have been way worse if this had snapped while she was riding on my husband's or my bike. So glad I was never able to use it.
customer_reviews.author: Carissa C.

customer_reviews.title: A must have
customer_reviews.text: So far so good. My 26 lb two year old loves this seat and seems very comfortable in it. The steering wheel is an added bonus. Also, it’s not in my way as we ride my beach cruiser. I did lots of research for a very long time before purchasing, and this product had the best ratings. Since we’ve only had it for a week, I’ll update my review after more usage.
customer_reviews.author: Queen De

customer_reviews.title: Great product
customer_reviews.text: I purchased open box which was missing bolts but back to product. Very very way to install as long as you have a bike with neck of about 6 or more inches which is most bikes. Really only one thing to install, main platform to hold seat. That attaches quickly, the seat slides on to this piece and that's about it. Took my 2 year old out for ride and she was in heaven. I was getting tires of pulling her around in her cart and this is great for long adventures. Feels super stable for both me and the baby. I can sell this working for years or until she is much bigger.
customer_reviews.author: MylesD

customer_reviews.title: Seller shipped a used seat, rickety and dirty
customer_reviews.text: My product came used, you could tell by the box, the opened packaging and by a streak of road grime slung up under the seat from the previous user. Seller didn't even attempt to clean or provide new hardware. They had stripped out the mounting hardware so i had to use my own with the bracket. The bracket to the bike is very sturdy, but the bracket to the seat mounts with one dinky little pin causing too much wiggle and play back and forth with my daughter in the seat. Very disappointed for the money, cool idea but a terrible experience
customer_reviews.author: Raleigh

customer_reviews.title: iBert Child Bicycle Seat - new version
customer_reviews.text: Wonderful!!! Easy to install and uninstall. Installs great on a Mongoose mountain bike with a short handle length. My child is comfortable and safe and we are happy and satisfied. It's worth your hard earned $. So, purchase it. Capture those memories. Only con and I would have purchased it still had I known before that the part that clamps down over the baby is not mounted on to the seat with screws. It clips on. It's just not my preference thinking about the plastic parts that clip wearing over time. I recommend this seat to all bikers with little ones.
customer_reviews.author: Flaminga

customer_reviews.title: Nice in theory, but too hard to pedal
customer_reviews.text: I wanted to love this, as I liked the idea of having my baby in front of me. But the leg room on my bike was terrible and I had to move my knees out to the side which made pedaling very awkward and unsafe feeling. I also couldn’t seem to quite tighten it down enough, so it just all around didn’t work great. Otherwise it appeared to be sturdy and well made. Wish it had worked, but returned and purchased one for a rear-mount one.
customer_reviews.author: Mamabear

customer_reviews.title: It looks to be built sturdy, but since she's 29lbs
customer_reviews.text: I just bought this seat for our two year old and she absolutely loves it. I wish I'd bought it sooner, but I was unsure on how she'd feel about being up so high. But she had no trouble at all settling in, getting buckled up, and grabbing a hold of the steering wheel pad and encouraging me to ride faster. Looking forward to some family rides for as long as she'll fit in the thing. It looks to be built sturdy, but since she's 29lbs, I'm hoping it holds up for a bit longer!
customer_reviews.author: Sam P

customer_reviews.title: Works wonderfully!
customer_reviews.text: Solid child seat for the bike, love it! Soft cushions, solid mounting hardware and safety features, and a cute little steering wheel for the kids. I love that it sits on the front of the bike so the kids can see where we ride rather than staring at moms back the whole time!
customer_reviews.author: Richard

customer_reviews.title: My co-pilot doesn't need a bulky trailer!
customer_reviews.text: Love this seat. My son does too! I wish I had found it sooner, but with him at 30 lbs., we still have time to put it to good use. I thought the instructions weren't totally clear as shown and fought with it a bit, scratching the seat up (my bike was unscathed) but when I figured out to remove the seat from its base entirely, that made it way easier! Steering is simple but pedaling uphill with my new load is more challenging. I have zero problems with leg room. My bike is an Electra Townie. We've gone on two rides and it's definitely a keeper.
customer_reviews.author: Sultenfuss

customer_reviews.title: Awesome way to have fun with your little one.
customer_reviews.text: Currently on my fat bike but have had it on my wife’s full suspension Yeti and my Yeti. Awesome way to have fun with the whole family! This paired with the tow wee for the older kids you can actually keep a decent pace up the hills. All single track MTB trails in the high Rocky Mountain of Colorado is what I am referring to here. Great fun for you and your child!
customer_reviews.author: Travis C.

customer_reviews.title: Best seat ever
customer_reviews.text: My son loves this. He can see everything while we ride. It also keeps his legs and feet away from the wheel. He’s two and about 30 lbs. I have no trouble seeing over him or steering. He can also talk to me while we ride. I used to have a seat on the back of my bike, but the baby’s foot was hurt during a ride so I stopped using it. I’ve used a trailer but it’s so far from the bike I can’t hear well or see the kids while riding. Eventually I will need a handle bar extender to raise up the handle bars to give him more leg clearance.
customer_reviews.author: Stacey t

customer_reviews.title: Love it
customer_reviews.text: This is one of my favorite purchases from Amazon. I have 2 sons and they both in it! My youngest was 13 months old when we got this, and my oldest is 4. My oldest is almost 40 inches tall, 34 lbs and fits perfectly! He may not fit much longer but we are still ecstatic that he’s able to use it this summer.
customer_reviews.author: ladizee

customer_reviews.title: Toddler loves it
customer_reviews.text: I love this seat. My 2 year old loves this seat. It mounts to the front of my bike and my two year old (who is very small for her age) fits in it find and I put my 3.5 year old niece in it too and she fit good too. Doesn't add too much weight or throw off the way I ride my bike like a trailer or back mounting seat does. And my daughter loves the steering wheel/pad on the front, she likes to pretend it's a horn lol great product and very worth the money for it
customer_reviews.author: Emmaly

customer_reviews.title: perfect for my almost two year old!!
customer_reviews.text: I am so excited about this seat. I needed something to put my toddler in so I could keep up with my older child while bike riding. This seat is awesome!!! I love that I am so close to the baby and can watch him while I ride. Appears to be very secure even when he's wobbling about. I like the concept of the front seat much better than the back because if I did fall, I would be able to catch/support him.
customer_reviews.author: KMAC

customer_reviews.title: Great seat! You will need a wrench to install.
customer_reviews.text: I’m loving the seat! I’m 5’ 6” and have no problem seeing over my toddlers head. We purchased a bike trailer, however, I am not strong enough to maneuver it, this has been so great. It takes a little time for me to start again after I stop but otherwise I hardly feel the added weight at all. My daughter feels comfortable in it too, she enjoys the view :) I had a neighbor help me install it as the tools included were not doing the job. He had to use a wrench and it took some time to get it hooked up. It’s finally on though, can’t wait for summer bike rides!
customer_reviews.author: AP418

customer_reviews.title: Easy to set up, a bit tight with short stems.
customer_reviews.text: This seat seemed like a great option given how simple it is to attach to a bike, so it is pretty easy to put on and take off. My bike has a very short stem (50mm) which turns out to be about the limit of what you can fit this seat to. As it is I had to drill one extra hole for the retaining pin, and the back part of the seat bracket just engages on the rail. If you have a super-short stem on your bike this mount probably won't work for you. Otherwise I like the seat, my daughter fits in it pretty well.
customer_reviews.author: Steve Hayward

customer_reviews.title: I love how my child can see what I see when we ride
customer_reviews.text: My son loves this chair! He wants to go for a ride every day! I love how you can ride with your child in your arms and how they can see what you see. My memory as a child was riding with my dad and it’s one of my best memories. Back then they only had seats that connected in the back. So all I could see was the sides and my dad’s back. My son loves pointing out to things as we ride and I feel super safe with him in between my arms.
customer_reviews.author: BeatActivated

customer_reviews.title: Great buy
customer_reviews.text: Great seat and my son loves it once he is inside, especially with the steering wheel. however my son is 15 months and thirty pounds with chunky legs and i have to remove his shoes and angle him just right to get his legs in. I haven’t upgraded to a new seat because he enjoys this one so much, but I’m not sure how much longer I will be able to get him in it. If your baby is on the slender this is a must have! Easy to install and sturdy
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Low back but great front seat!
customer_reviews.text: This is easy enough to attach to bike and clip baby in. I use this for my almost 6 month old. It must be comfortable because she falls asleep every time we ride! I gave 4 stars because of the low back. I’m not sure if it would make sense to have a higher back in this location but it would feel more comfortable to me regarding whiplash for her if I have to stop suddenly. Overall, we love it!!
customer_reviews.author: ACKK

customer_reviews.title: Good product but...
customer_reviews.text: This is a great idea! I loved it. Was easy to install just make sure that the tighting screws you screw in evenly or you will have trouble. This item is not for a mountain bike. I was excited to install it. Got it done. Then I couldn't move the steering for the bike. I'm so disappointed. I have to look for something else because I am definitely not buying another bike.
customer_reviews.author: Mamicandy

customer_reviews.title: I love this thing
customer_reviews.text: I love this thing! I spent a couple days researching different bike seats. This one had the best reviews and I liked that it was close to the handle bars. Installation took about 2minutes. You can easily take it off in the same amount of time with an L keys. I have this mounted on a 700cc Shwinn hybrid 28" road bike. I'm 5'7" and my knees don't bump against it while riding. I did have to lower the seat a bit though. My son loved it! I would definitely recommend this!
customer_reviews.author: N@

customer_reviews.title: Probably my best purchase of the year.
customer_reviews.text: My 18 mo Daughter loves it. It's super easy to remove when I'm riding without her, and to re-attach quickly when we're together. My son loves riding his bike and he's getting to the age where he wants to go farther and farther -- this opens up the world to us without having to deal with a bulky trailer seat that talks up space in our trunk.
customer_reviews.author: niftyacres

customer_reviews.title: Beautiful experiences
customer_reviews.text: Perfect! My 14 month old daughter laughs and loves it. I love being able to "hover" over her and speak with her as we ride. This sure beats having her behind me in the carrier or in a trailer. No mud in her face and I can explain things that we see on our rides, "Cow - cow says moooooooo". Balance for riding is better than other carrier methods, also. No interference with my knees, I am 5' 10". She loves the "steering wheel" I think being able to hold on makes it feel more secure for her.
customer_reviews.author: Josue

customer_reviews.title: Worth the money!
customer_reviews.text: We did a lot of research on a seat that would be safe, fit our mountain bikes, and provide leg room for both our little one and my husband. After about a week of doing our homework we decided on the ibert and we LOVE it. Our little one feels comfortable and safe while riding. Install is barely even 10 minutes and it’s even easier to take down if you need to. The only complaint I have is that where the shoulder straps are positioned, it’s a little difficult to position them nicely on to the shoulders but with a little extra effort, you can make it work and they are snug and secure. We definitely recommend.
customer_reviews.author: Deana Bovino

customer_reviews.title: Easy
customer_reviews.text: I haven’t been on a bike in years and I was originally very intimidated by this concept because I wasn’t super confident. By the second time on the bike I felt like a pro and my baby (1 1/2) loves it. Her legs are on the smallest setting so she can use this for a while. She “talks” and points when we are on it. I love this product.
customer_reviews.author: Bonnie

customer_reviews.title: Kid loves it!
customer_reviews.text: Updating: the first one I received looked used and was missing some parts. The second one came new with all parts. My kiddo loves the seat, although it’s a bit of a tight fit to get his legs into the seat under the handlebars (he can’t wear shoes and get them through). I am using a Marlin 6 mountain bike though - so this is likely just due to my brand of bike. He is happy with it though, and loves the little steering wheel.
customer_reviews.author: KNewts

customer_reviews.title: Missing parts
customer_reviews.text: This item arrived with all of the hardware loose in a poorly sealed box. To no surprise, it was missing several pieces, a regular nut, a wing nut, some screws. I was unable to assemble this car seat. Poor packaging!!
customer_reviews.author: Nicole Payne

customer_reviews.title: My Little One Loves It!!
customer_reviews.text: As soon as I finished installing this product I took my 2 year old out for a ride...she was babbling, giggling and a "weeeee' here and there, all the time we were riding !! When we returned home she didn't get off! I gave this 4 stars only because it came missing a couple of screws. Luckily I had the right size screws around.
customer_reviews.author: Pete

customer_reviews.title: Great fun product!
customer_reviews.text: This things great! Kid loves it and feels a lot better than dragging the kid from behind. It’s just easier for me to have eyes on the little one. The seat was extremely easy to install. My ONLY complaint is the plastic connecting piece that latches over the kid can be difficult to open. I would definitely recommend this!
customer_reviews.author: Double L

customer_reviews.title: Not enough space between ibert and bike seat
customer_reviews.text: My son LOVES biking around in this thing! It looks kinda sketchy when assembling it but once on the bike it feels safe. My biggest problem is there isn’t a lot of space between the ibert and my bike seat. So getting on and off I have to lean way over then have to swivel the handle bar so I can get on and squeeze in. I’m not sure if it’s my bike or operator error but just be aware! Other than that it’s awesome once we are up and running.
customer_reviews.author: Demi

customer_reviews.title: LOVE!!
customer_reviews.text: This has been absolutely perfect for my littlest (started riding with her at 14 months and she is still loving it at 18 months). Now the whole family can go on bike rides and feel very safe with the babe riding in front and in sight of my husband (or my oldest son) riding with her. And my little one ADORES her bike rides!!
customer_reviews.author: beachbum

customer_reviews.title: My Toddler Loves It, A little pricey, though
customer_reviews.text: My toddler loves it. If you have been thinking of riding bike with your kid, this is it. Whoever sees us riding are impressed. I've overheard passers-by saying they got to get one for their kids. Insatllation is very easy if you get it right. Make sure that the base lever is facing up correctly because I had it upside down and took some time to figure out my mistake. I think installation instructions could be clearer. Some real pictures would help rather than just schematics. Also, I don't know why it costs so much. If they brought the price down I am sure many people would buy it who won't otherwise.
customer_reviews.author: PJ

customer_reviews.title: My 2 year old loves it!
customer_reviews.text: We got this for my 2 year old and she absolutely loves it! We do feel secure about her being safe in it. It took my husband a few tries before he figured out how to install it properly on the bike we have. He almost had me return it before he tried something else, so be sure to give the install of it a few tries before giving up.
customer_reviews.author: Michelle Rarrat

customer_reviews.title: Nice design for the most part
customer_reviews.text: Works great, very intelligent design, except that on my "beach cruiser" style bike there is so little room between the handlebars and the seat (which mounts on the stem below the handlebars) that my son can't hardly get his feet through. But given the other seats out there that sit in the front, I'm not sure any of them would do it better.
customer_reviews.author: The Mad Papist

customer_reviews.title: Love
customer_reviews.text: Easy to install, feels so ecure and safe with him in between my arms as we cruise. Seat belt and lap bar is a great option too... He loves to pretend to steer and rocking his new helmet too. He's 16 months old and 30 lbs with room to spare... Loves it!
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: No hardware was included!!!!
customer_reviews.text: I dislike the fact that none of the screws came in the box ad they were supposed to. So now I have to go to hardware store and purchase my own screws after I just bought this seat. Very frustrating.
customer_reviews.author: Sessa

customer_reviews.title: He likes it!
customer_reviews.text: My grandad loves to ride with me. The only junk thing was that the shoulder straps for the harness kept falling off his little shoulders. So I made them longer and crossed the straps in the back. Problem solved!
customer_reviews.author: Tutu Debbie

customer_reviews.title: Very easy to instal and my son loves it.
customer_reviews.text: The leg room is whide and long enogh for my 20 month toddler. I like the wheel in the front which makes him feel more secured and was useful for him to lean on when he fell asleep on our first ride. I don't like that the recliner of the chair is only half his back, which makes the seat belts be at his arm not on top of his shoulder like it should be.
customer_reviews.author: lisette camacho

customer_reviews.title: Missing parts
customer_reviews.text: I’d sure like to give this 4-5 stars, but there was 1 bolt, 1 washer, and a locknut missing. Also the box wasn’t secure at all. It might be a good product, but the parts/packaging carelessness makes me question what else the company slacks on. Buy the seat, but be prepared to find your own hardware.
customer_reviews.author: Bcompton53

customer_reviews.title: It’s nice but it can scratch your bike
customer_reviews.text: I love this seat for taking my kids on bike rides. I don’t like the fact that I scratched up my handlebar pole where you’re suppose to secure it to. They should make it more so out of rubber so that way it preserves the paint on your bike, especially if I paid 550 for my Giant brand bike and now it has scratches on it.
customer_reviews.author: Jared

customer_reviews.title: VERY DANGEROUS! DO NOT BUY!
customer_reviews.text: This seat almost cost my 16 month old son and I our lives. We set the bike seat up perfectly. We followed the directions to a T and watched the instructional video multiple times to make sure everything was secure. The first couple of rides were great, until we were out riding and the latch under the seat came loose and the seat slid and blocked my wheel from turning and my son and I went flying into the middle of the street. Thanks goodness my son was not harmed but I ended up in the hospital. I contacted the company and have yet to hear from them. Very disappointed to say the very least!
customer_reviews.author: Rachel

customer_reviews.title: Cheap plastic, poor customer service.
customer_reviews.text: Seat showed up missing a piece of hardware, had to go to buy the missing part at lowes. There was a mark on the seat when it showed up as well. When we tried to strap her foot in the restraint it broke. I called their customer service line they told me there was nothing they could do and I needed to use their website.
customer_reviews.author: James

customer_reviews.title: Quality child's seat
customer_reviews.text: This kids seat is the best one around, and I have tried a few of them. This is my second one, the first one I passed down to a friend who is using it on her second child. I prefer the seats that are positioned in the front, the baby loves the view. That front positioned seat also allows you to see your child, and explain to them what they are seeing. My daughter rode in this until she was 3. The installation is very simple I was able to have it all put together in less than 10 minutes.
customer_reviews.author: ThatGirl208

customer_reviews.title: Fits well on certain bikes
customer_reviews.text: Fit well on my husband’s bike with some minor adjustments. He had to buy bigger bolts to make it work with his handlebars. Unfortunately, the point of the seat was to use it on my bike because my husband also has to haul my 5yo in a bike trailer so i was trying to offload some of the weight for long rides. It just didn’t work on my Diamondback Hybrid.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Fun to use
customer_reviews.text: My wife and I purchased two of these seats to use while biking with our 8 month old and 1 year old grand daughters. We placed them on our Trek mountain bikes. They fit my bike well, but the side of the child seat is very close to my wife's handle bars and the gear shift switch. Our handle bars are more straight across and this seat is probably better suited for handle bars that are curved upward. But, all in all, a good product and the kids love going on bike rides.
customer_reviews.author: Dan

customer_reviews.title: Easy to install
customer_reviews.text: Easy to install, great fit on my beach cruiser style bike. Harness is very easy to adjust. Hex key included so you dont need any additional tools for mounting. I gave this a 4 rating instead of a 5 because of a minor issue with the pin. The locking part of the pin just dangles and would hit the bike frame when I turn. I had to tie it up with velcro to make sure it stayed clamped down to the metal T-bar provided.
customer_reviews.author: Jocelyn

customer_reviews.title: Bad Turning
customer_reviews.text: First off, this came used with missing parts. Secondly, it reduces your turning radius BY ALOT. I would not recommend this.
customer_reviews.author: Krys

customer_reviews.title: Love taking our little on bike rides!
customer_reviews.text: Great product and we take my little boy on regular bike rides with us! It was easy to install as well. My 3 stars are bc I’m extremely annoyed that certain colors were $20 more expensive and we should price things the same despite being a “boy” or “girl” color.
customer_reviews.author: Jackiesomething

customer_reviews.title: Missing Pieces
customer_reviews.text: I'd like to review this product, but unfortunately the "Cap Screws" needed to attach the "Steel Mounting Bar" to the bike weren't included in the box. I tried calling iBert during their normal business hours, but only got a recording that they were closed. I sent an email to their customer service, and will update this review once I get a response. In terms of build quality, the fit and finish appear good, and I like the use of thick plastics and supportive form for the kid. How it fits on the bike, that's to be determined once I get the actual pieces to install it.
customer_reviews.author: Issa Azat

customer_reviews.title: Great value!
customer_reviews.text: We LOVE this bike!!! Our son actually demands one or more rides every day, and we get stopped a lot to ask where we got it. It’s easy to put on, comfortable for our son, comfortable for us, and nice to be able to talk to our son as we ride. I recommend this to anyone looking to take their little on adventures.
customer_reviews.author: Amanda G.

customer_reviews.title: Great product
customer_reviews.text: Easy to install and to take off. My daughter is 33lbs and it holds her perfect. We have had 3 rides so far. The seat dose not effect my pedaling or hands on the handlebars. It’s a little tricky to load and unload my kid, but if I stand in front of the bike and use my feet and knees to hold the front tire it works well.
customer_reviews.author: jesse taylor

customer_reviews.title: Easy to install
customer_reviews.text: Great bike seat carrier for my toddler who is under 35 pounds. She likes to point to things she sees in front of me. I've used rear seat carriers, comparatively this one feels like I have a lot more control when my toddler is in the seat. Easy to use if you're alone and itching for a quick ride around the block.
customer_reviews.author: Mel S.

customer_reviews.title: This thing is amazing! My daughter LOVES going for rides
customer_reviews.text: This thing is amazing! My daughter LOVES going for rides. So much that when we're done she has a little tantrum. Combine this with a co-pilot for the older siblings and we are good to go. I also love that she's in front of me. The down side is she's always changing my gears...usually in the opposite direction I need to be.
customer_reviews.author: mere

customer_reviews.title: Love it!
customer_reviews.text: This guy was a pain in the butt to install. I tried for an hour and wasn't able to do it myself. Had to have my handyman husband do it and he found it annoying but was able to do it in under 20minutes. Other than the installation, we love this seat! My daughter enjoys it too. Well worth the $$
customer_reviews.author: Anastacia Jensen

customer_reviews.title: Great front seat, way better than rear ones
customer_reviews.text: My son loves this seat. A lot better than the rear ones. Recommended by a friend and I’ll recommend it to everyone w/ a child. Don’t buy the rear seat ones. But this. My little guy loves it
customer_reviews.author: J. Raposa

customer_reviews.title: Pricey child seat without proper tools to fit
customer_reviews.text: It was tricky to fix in some bikes. You will surely need proper tools to fix because the ones that come with this kit is pretty useless. Even after fixing it tightly, the seat gets to an angle. The safety features are good though. Highly not recommended for people On road bikes
customer_reviews.author: Vinoth Kumar

customer_reviews.title: Nice quality and my 18 month old son loves riding ...
customer_reviews.text: Nice quality and my 18 month old son loves riding in it. My only complaint are the straps - they are good but very difficult to adjust with one hand and since I'm trying to put him in it and have to readjust the straps sometime based on what he's wearing this can make things difficult. Specifically the clip that adjusts the length of the strap can fall off when trying to adjust.
customer_reviews.author: Kris

customer_reviews.title: Used with missing parts
customer_reviews.text: Upon unboxing, it was clear this was used as it had dirt, scuff marks and missing hardware. Since this product has good reviews, I've decided to return and order a new one. Hopefully the next one will have all of the hardware so I can provide a proper review.
customer_reviews.author: Carly Davidson

customer_reviews.title: Amazing
customer_reviews.text: Ok so I have a mountain bike and it fit really well for me. I'm 5'4 but my knees just barely fit that the only hiccup. BUT!!!!! If I had an adjustable handle bar I would have rated it 5 stars across the board. Its light weight. Super secure for my little girl. She enjoyed the steering wheel that doubles as a debree gard. I'm very happy with the buy.
customer_reviews.author: natasha

customer_reviews.title: Great seat!
customer_reviews.text: Debated for a long time what kind of bike seat for my 16 mo and am so happy with this seat. She loves it, especially the steering wheel. I love having her right between my arms and letting her see where we are going. Highly recommend & fits great on my cruiser bike.
customer_reviews.author: Amy Heno

customer_reviews.title: Look no further....
customer_reviews.text: Awesome bike seat!!!! Comfortable for 2 1/2 year old son. I have a women’s mountain bike and it fits great! Easy to balance and ride. Definitely recommend this for purchase!!!
customer_reviews.author: casie

customer_reviews.title: Flimsy and poorly designed.
customer_reviews.text: Foot strap pegs broke after 3rd time using it. There is a lot of wiggle and it feels loose. I tried to call the manufacturer for warranty issues and no one picked up after being on hold for 40 minutes. Will be sending it back to Amazon and purchasing a different seat for our daughter. Also not a lot of leg clearance between the handle bars and the child legs.
customer_reviews.author: saman khosravi

customer_reviews.title: Son loves it
customer_reviews.text: This thing is awesome. My son loves it. Every time we get back home after a ride and I oped the tray, he immediately closes it to let me know he wants to keep riding. I’ve never tried a rear seat or carriage stye carrier and having this first, I can’t imagine using anything else. I did have to install a handlebar extension on my bike, picked one up at a local bike shop for $20.
customer_reviews.author: NL

customer_reviews.title: My little girl love it.
customer_reviews.text: Very good design. My little 2 years old girl love it. In the front it’s better feeling. She likes to feeling fast. Great. Easy install and we are use for 2 months already. No problem. Working great. Buy it. Now.
customer_reviews.author: ommy chen

customer_reviews.title: Awesome Purchase
customer_reviews.text: My 1 year old loves this and gets super excited to go for a ride. We go almost daily and I haven't really noticed anything that I don't like. I love that she is in front of me and I can keep an eye on her...including being able to wipe a snotty nose!
customer_reviews.author: Mae883

customer_reviews.title: Not what I expected
customer_reviews.text: I love that it is in the front of my bike. But the first time riding it the bolts fell off and the shoe connectors also broke. Also, for some reason the straps are tighter on one side versus the other. Further no matter where I placed it on my bike my knees hit it. It was a bit disappointing.
customer_reviews.author: Allison Ruhlmann

customer_reviews.title: Awesome product!
customer_reviews.text: We love this seat SO much! My 14 month old gets to go on family bike rides now. As you can see from his face, he is LIVING HIS BEST LIFE NOW!
customer_reviews.author: Laurel

customer_reviews.title: Good product
customer_reviews.text: My daughter loves bike rides in this. My turning is slightly limited cause my knees hit. I'm 6 foot. Can't stand and peddle,but that never stops us from having a fun ride.
customer_reviews.author: Chris Hernandez

customer_reviews.title: Great purchase!
customer_reviews.text: I read a lot of reviews and I decided to pick this one because with this seat you do not have to ride bow legged. My son is 16 months old and still have space to use for maybe two more years. Very easy to install and uncomplicated to remove. I can't say enough, it's awesome!!
customer_reviews.author: Maria Crystina Igarashi

customer_reviews.title: Shoe peg already is broken but love the actual seat
customer_reviews.text: I have used the seat 5x and really have enjoyed riding with my son who is 19 months old. BUT the peg for the shoe strap is already broken. It completely broke off. So one of his shoes cannot be strapped now. Paying so much for a seat that's already broken is very irritating
customer_reviews.author: mark harris

customer_reviews.title: Though it's not a great fit for my personal bike, I love it!
customer_reviews.text: This bike seat has allowed me to get great exercise! My two-year-old loves going for bike rides with me. I had a difficult time getting it to fit on my bike. I really had to shove it into place while my husband quickly put the pin into it. Luckily, that worked. It took quite a while for me to figure it out though. The other problem I have is it is so close to my handlebars that my son has to have completely straight legs when I put him in, or his legs will bump into the handlebars and he won't be able to fit in. In spite of those issues, I love the seat!!
customer_reviews.author: Brittany G

customer_reviews.title: Not what I expected
customer_reviews.text: My daughter is 15 months. (Maybe she’s on the larger size) but felt like she was already too big . Plus the back was too low. No back support for her.
customer_reviews.author: Hjbaby

customer_reviews.title: Great 5 out of 5
customer_reviews.text: This thing is great lil one loves it, easy on and off and you don’t even know it’s on perfect center of gravity .... one thing I wish was there is a tad more padding and maybe something for when they fall asleep lol but 5 out of 5 Best Buy on Amazon in a long time
customer_reviews.author: brad bond

customer_reviews.title: Your whole family will be out riding all the time
customer_reviews.text: The best money I have spent in recent months! My daughter absolutely loves it and asks almost every day to go out for a bike ride which I am happy to do as I try to limit her TV time. This also gets me out and moving/exercising so it's great for me too. We have started to make a game of finding new trails and parks to ride at and that is fun for the whole family. The product feels like they made it with high quality materials and trust me, it is SO EASY to install. I am not handy at all and I was able to install it in less than 15min : )
customer_reviews.author: Ao Bella

customer_reviews.title: this seemed awesome! however
customer_reviews.text: this seemed awesome! however, I had to return it since it didn't fit on my mountain bike (be sure your bike can raise its handlebars. that was the problem with it fitting on my bike). otherwise, it was really easy to install, took less than 5 minutes and looked awesome!
customer_reviews.author: Blake Hansen

customer_reviews.title: Best bike seat ever!
customer_reviews.text: This seat is AWESOME!! Our little guy sits comfortable and loves seeing all the action! He can "steer" the bike oj our trips and loves waving at everyone. We have had so many comments and compliments about the seat since we bought it and use it all the time. It's super easy to install and adjust and is very sturdy. Two thumbs way up!!
customer_reviews.author: Jennifer

customer_reviews.title: Best "baby airbag"
customer_reviews.text: I giggle a little to see "comfort" as a category to rate. I haven't personally sat in this seat but my 1 year old likes it because she has the best view. Lol Great seat! Good job
customer_reviews.author: George S

customer_reviews.title: This has been a great seat for us
customer_reviews.text: This has been a great seat for us. I bought it for my 2-year-old and have been using it almost daily for about 2 months. Install was easy enough, and it seems very safe and secure. It takes some getting used to, as there's a change in weight distribution than riding solo or with a rear-mounted seat, but after one ride with a spotter, I felt confident to go riding with just my toddler. My only complaint is that the straps seems almost useless-- with the way they're positioned, they don't stay on my son's shoulders. Still, the front bar keeps him in place, and I don't worry about him falling out.
customer_reviews.author: Rachel J. Rowe

customer_reviews.title: Installed on Specialized Camber--tight squeeze but functional.
customer_reviews.text: Searched everywhere for a good bike seat for our 16 month old. My husband and I both ride Specialized Camber Comp (27.5in) mountain bikes and it's nearly impossible to get a rear child seat installed on them. Although this is a tight fit and I had to get a riser placed on the handle bar stem, it's worth it for what we need right now. Our daughter loves it and I can't wait to ride with her more and more.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: No foot room top get in, lap bar doesn't shut
customer_reviews.text: It's works overall so we can ride, but I have to put her in then put her shoes on, feet won't fit under the handle bars with shoes, and the lap bar doesn't close all the way.
customer_reviews.author: Shannon Razorblade

customer_reviews.title: Worth it!
customer_reviews.text: My son loves this. Have used this a few times so far and it’s held up pretty sturdy. I’ve read other reviews of it snapping and hoping that doesn’t occur!
customer_reviews.author: Banana nana

customer_reviews.title: Perfect. My daughter is 2 and fits very well
customer_reviews.text: Perfect. My daughter is 2 and fits very well. I was worried in a year she would be too tall, but think she would still be able to fit. It comes off very easily when I want to ride my bike without her. So easy to install and take off. The attachment to the bike when not using the seat can hit you in the knees when turning. So need to work around that. But easy fix when I pay attention.
customer_reviews.author: Charles Buchanan

customer_reviews.title: Riding this seat makes my toddler happy
customer_reviews.text: My 18 month old has a blast riding this bike seat, whether going down hills at 25mph, or simply looking at the cars, trucks, and animals visible from the bike path. Being able to talk with her, and look at things together is really nice. The bike seat also keeps her secure when she falls asleep during a bike ride.
customer_reviews.author: Kindle Customer

customer_reviews.title: Works great and I feel safe riding with it
customer_reviews.text: Works great. Ordered red, pink arrived (amazon said keep it and gave all of our money back). 21 month old loves it. He’s big, 34lbs and it supports him.
customer_reviews.author: Kyle Dinger

customer_reviews.title: Easy and Fun
customer_reviews.text: This was easy to assemble, easy to put on the bike, easy to put my gigantic (30 lb, 34 in) 18 month old in and easy to bike with. It took some adjusting in the way I pedal (it makes you splay your knees out a bit) but I would have been surprised if it didn't. Plus now we don't have to worry about the upkeep of a trailer with tires. Very happy with this purchase!
customer_reviews.author: Lisa Catanese

customer_reviews.title: GET this now!
customer_reviews.text: Can't say enough good things about this bike seat. We get compliments from neighbors and smiles from people we pass by. Installed this on a beach bike with relative ease. Get this bike seat, it's worth the cost for the quality. Our daughter loves the view from the front and playing with the steering wheel, plus she can ring the bicycle bell. Best buy we've made this year.
customer_reviews.author: Momazon

customer_reviews.title: Great front carrier
customer_reviews.text: I installed on a 26" cruiser, in about 5-10 minutes with no issues. I'm 6'1 and my knees don't hit the seat, which seems to be a problem with a lot of other front-carriers. 16 month old loves it. The shoulder straps sit kind of wide. That's my only complaint.
customer_reviews.author: A. Johnson

customer_reviews.title: Bad bad
customer_reviews.text: I ordered one , and it had missing parts and looked used with marks and dirt. I returned that and ordered another one . That also came with pieces missing , torn box and with dirt like it was used . Also it is a no go if you are shorter than 5’5. They should put that in item description.
customer_reviews.author: Tripti Luintel

customer_reviews.title: Great device, safe easy functional and a GREAT experience!
customer_reviews.text: My 9 month old loves it! Stable, secure, easy to set up, safe and visible between my arms, not significantly jostled in motion. I am really amazed at how I get to share the ride with her and see her enjoy it and smile. Just a great new dad moment that wouldn't be the same with a rear mount system.
customer_reviews.author: Joshua R.

customer_reviews.title: A bit worry about safety
customer_reviews.text: It looking good and my son like it. But only one problem is that the seat is wiggling even though my husband screw pretty tight.
customer_reviews.author: Liming Chen

customer_reviews.title: LOVE IT
customer_reviews.text: My son LOVES going on bike rides in this. he is almost 7 months and he loves holding onto the little steering wheel thing and beating on it as we ride. I feel like he is very safe in it with the harness and then the lap bar. Ordered a baby helmet off AMAZON as well to go with it.
customer_reviews.author: sasha lynch

customer_reviews.title: Great for babies
customer_reviews.text: My 10 month old now loves bike rides! The little circle in the front moves like a steering wheel. He already loves that feature too! We had to figure out how to raise the handle bars on my bike. Once we did that, install was very easy.
customer_reviews.author: Mom o’ 3

customer_reviews.title: Do not recommend
customer_reviews.text: The components were just thrown into the box, the box had holes in it and looked like someone made an attempt to patch it back together. One if the lock nuts was missing, so it could not be assembled. Refunded.
customer_reviews.author: Chris Boyd

customer_reviews.title: Great for beach cruisers !
customer_reviews.text: Great for beach cruisers ! My two and a half year old loves going on bike rides and is on a taller and chunkier side and she was comfy
customer_reviews.author: mariya

customer_reviews.title: Wonderful seat
customer_reviews.text: We’ve been using this bike seat for my one year old for about a month now and she loves it! Super easy and quick install and I love that she sits in the front of the bike as opposed to in the back like you see with a lot of other child bike carriers. It makes it so much easier for her to see out and even my 3 year old still fits the requirements
customer_reviews.author: John satriana

customer_reviews.title: Would def buy again!
customer_reviews.text: Love this seat and so does baby! It's on my husbands bike and he says it works great. He has to slightly open his legs, but it's not bad. We got so many complements too. Plus I like that we don't have her behind us like most carriers. From what I understand those are heavy and because it's behind your bike, your tires throw up dirt and debris into the carrier. Plus I want to to actually see things, not be stuck in a cage looking through netting.
customer_reviews.author: Andrea Gehle

customer_reviews.title: You will not regret this purchase!
customer_reviews.text: Definitely recommend this seat! I did a lot of research on toddler bike seats and kept coming back to this one. Only took a couple of minutes to install. Fit my 26” Schwinn mountain bike with zero issues. I’m 5’3” and my legs didn’t hit the seat. Plenty of room between me and my toddler. She was very comfortable and it was a smooth, easy ride!
customer_reviews.author: Karmen Vongprachanh

customer_reviews.title: Easy to use, fun for child
customer_reviews.text: We just got this bike seat a few days ago, but we have gotten a lot of use out of it already! Our 13 month old loves riding around the neighborhood!
customer_reviews.author: Sherrie

customer_reviews.title: My 19 month old loved it
customer_reviews.text: Tried yesterday for the first time and my daughter loved it. She would turn her face to me to get kisses and was happy she could hear me talking to her. A little harder for me to ride but it takes time. I have a mountain bike and it took a while to install the seat. Not much room left for me to get on a bike and not much legroom, but if you are 5,6 like me or shorter - should be fine.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Easy to use
customer_reviews.text: This took a minute to put on, realized I was making it harder than it had to be. Easy to put the kid into and take out. You don't lose bike balance when riding. My son absolutely loves it.
customer_reviews.author: Thomas F. Gain

product_meta.title: iBert Child Bicycle Safe-T-Seat
product_meta.description: The iBert safe-T-seat provides families with exactly what they are looking for in a childrens bike seat; comfort, safety, an attractive and innovative design, and a good position where the child can fully explore the scenery. Nestled safely between the adult's arms and behind the protection of the bicycle handlebars, the child can look around and be involved with the ride with mom or dad by turning the padded steering wheel. Center mounted provides a better center of gravity and increased mobility for the adult rider. Better view and more enjoyable ride for the child. The child safely positioned behind the handlebars allows for better communication. Unlike trailers - no dirt, rocks or water thrown in the child's face. Easier, safer loading and unloading of the child. Made in the USA.
